name: Othello
overview: Your piece must be placed on the board in such a way that it traps those of your opponent in the vertical, diagonal and horizontal directions. If you are unable to move, you must touch 'Miss a go' and your opponent will be enabled. The winner is the one who has the most pieces at the end of the game. This game requires a light pen which should be plugged into the computer's 'analogue in' port.
